About Me

Major Posts

  • Jul 6, 2018

    A Project Based Introduction to TensorFlow.js

    In this post we introduce how to use TensorFlow.js by demonstrating how it was used in the simple project Neural Titanic. In this project, we show how to visualize the evolution of the predictions of a single layer neural network as it is being trained on the tabular Titanic Dataset for the task of binary classification of passenger survival.

I blog about software, mathematics, machine learning, philosophy, psychology, art and the connections between them. My main interest is machine learning and how it can be used to automatically build models that are near impossible for humans to develop with traditional methods.
